description: Detects uses of the SysInternals Procdump utility in which procdump or its output get renamed or a dump file is moved ot copied to a different name
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: Cases in which procdump just gets copied to a different directory without any renaming
name: Procdump Evasion
query: ((process.command_line.text:(*copy\ procdump* OR *move\ procdump*)) OR ((process.command_line.text:*copy\ * AND process.command_line.text:*.dmp\ * AND process.command_line.text:(*2.dmp* OR *lsass* OR *out.dmp*))) OR (process.command_line.text:(*copy\ lsass.exe_* OR *move\ lsass.exe_*)))
